RelatedSentence: How intensely a person responds to sexual images can be linked his or her number of sexual partners , according to a new study .

Researchers at the University of California of Los Angeles asked 40 male and 22 female subjects how many sex partners they had last year before they showed them 225 images , both sexual and non-sexual .

The researchers analyzed subjects ' ' late positive potential , which reacts to images depending on their emotional intensity , ' by using an electroencephalogram ( EEG ) , according to a press release .
